qas.question: How many Protestants are there in the world?
What is the total population of Christians in the world?
Approximately how much of the world's population are Protestant (in fractions)?
What area only had about 2 million Protestants in 2010?
What area had the largest Protestant population in 2010?

context: There are <a0_0>more than 900 million<a0_0/> Protestants worldwide,[ad] among <a1_0>approximately 2.4 billion<a1_0/> Christians.[ae] In 2010, a total of more than 800 million included 300 million in <a4_0>Sub-Saharan Africa<a4_0/>, 260 million in the Americas, 140 million in Asia-Pacific region, 100 million in Europe and 2 million in <a3_0>Middle East-North Africa<a3_0/>. Protestants account for nearly forty percent of Christians worldwide and <a2_0>more than one tenth<a2_0/> of the total human population. Various estimates put the percentage of Protestants in relation to the total number of world's Christians at 33%, 36%, 36.7%, and 40%, while in relation to the world's population at 11.6% and 13%.
